Title: Carrots
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), Liz Friedman, David Renaud (executive story editor), Karen Struck (executive story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (story editor), Mark Rozeman (staff writer), Brian Shin (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Tamlyn Tomita
Plot: When a patient suffering from anorexia can't gain the necessary weight needed to survive heart surgery, Claire suggests they perform an experimental surgery which Melendez strongly opposes....
